title: Microsoft Teams Issues
description: Troubleshooting Microsoft Teams problems including connectivity, audio/video, and screen sharing.

steps.title: Restart Teams
steps.instruction: Close Teams completely (right-click Teams icon in system tray → Quit), then reopen it. This fixes most temporary glitches.

steps.title: Check Internet Connection
steps.instruction: Ensure you have a stable internet connection. Run a speed test - Teams requires at least 1.5 Mbps for video calls.

steps.title: Clear Teams Cache
steps.instruction: Windows: Close Teams, press Win+R, type %appdata%\Microsoft\Teams, delete the Cache folder. Mac: ~/Library/Application Support/Microsoft/Teams → delete Cache. Restart Teams.

steps.title: Check Audio/Video Settings
steps.instruction: In Teams: Settings → Devices → Test your camera, microphone, and speakers. Make sure the correct devices are selected.

steps.title: Update Teams
steps.instruction: Click your profile picture → Check for updates. Or download the latest version from Microsoft's website.
